How much did Mr Maltravers insure his life for?
10.000 pounds,15.000 pounds,50.000 pounds -c
Where did they find blood on the victim's body?
arms,legs,lips -c
When was the last time Mrs. Maltravers has seen her husband on Wednesday?
at lunch -c,before sleep,after dinner
What was the man's name?
Mr. Matravers,Captain Black -c,It wasn't mentioned
What did the woman hear?
footsteps,loud noises,Three taps on the window -c
Who confessed to killing the man?
Mrs. Maltravers -c,Everett,No one
